name: Virtue Insight's Packaging, Labelling, Serialisation, Track & Trace, Supply Chain 2024
content: 6th Annual Pharma Packaging, Labelling, Serialisation, Track & Trace, Supply Chain 2024 “Securing your Supply Chain & Quality Management” 24th July 2024, Novotel Hyderabad Convention Centre, Hyderabad, India The 2024 agenda looks at ongoing regulations, end-to-end artwork, sustainability, serialization, e-labelling and patient safety. Top pharmaceutical companies, biotechs, CMOs and regulatory bodies and many more will come together to share their insights into compliant packaging and labelling implementation. Please contact me for Sponsor / Delegate at E-mail - kavitha@virtueinsight.co.in or M: +91 9361957193 / +91 44 24762472 SPONSORS: Principal Partner - URL Asepetic Automation Silver Partner - Shriram Veritech Solutions Exhibitor - Control Print, QRious Codes, Mahesh Plastic Industries We have more sponsorship opportunities available for the event, which gives you an opportunity to Exhibit/Speak and create brand awareness.
